data.message:
Come on Coca-Cola. Nothing in the South East, Kent, Surrey or Sussex.  But you go to Watford twice.  
Loved coming to see you at Bluewater shopping Centre but nothing close this year.  
I think you need to look at your routes.  I understand not being able to around everywhere but why have 2 visits right next to each other I.e. Watford.

replies.message: Hi Adrian, each year we try our best to add new locations to our tour so everyone has a chance to be able to experience the truck tour on the build-up to Christmas, sadly, it's not possible for us to visit every place. However, we'll take your comment into consideration. Thanks
